title: Sweet chilli beef stir-fry with rice

ingredients.item: 230g essential Waitrose British Beef Frying Steak, shredded
265g pack Waitrose Vegetable Ribbon Stir Fry (selected stores)
250g pouch Waitrose Microwaveable Whole Grain Rice

instructions.step: Mix the soy sauce into the beef, along with the ginger, and leave for 5 minutes. Stir in the cornflour.
Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the steak for 4-5 minutes. Add the stir-fry vegetables, and cook for 3 minutes. Stir in the chilli sauce, and heat through.
Meanwhile, heat the rice according to the pack instructions, and serve with the beef stir-fry.
